DOC.brief_summary: Study to evaluate the efficacy of metamizole in reducing morphine requirements in patients with moderate to severe chronic cancer pain in comparison to administration of placebo or diclofenac.
DOC.brief_title: Metamizol for the Treatment of Neoplastic Chronic Pain
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized patients with neoplastic chronic pain requiring morphine treatment Karnofsky index less than 30%
